snippet: The attack, part of the Saudi-led bombing campaign against the Houthi militants, may have been intended for a target a mile and a half away.
abstract: Yemeni officials say at least nine people from one family were killed in apparent airstriked by Saudi-led military coalition outside Sana.

byline.original: By MOHAMMED ALI KALFOOD and KAREEM FAHIM
byline.contributor: Mohammed Ali Kalfood reported from Sana, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: The attack, part of the Saudi-led bombing campaign against the Houthi militants, may have been intended for a target a mile and a half away.

headline.main: Apparent Saudi Strike Kills at Least Nine in Yemeni Family
headline.print_headline: Apparent Saudi Strike Kills at Least Nine in Yemeni Family
